info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 1:05AM EDT until May 14 at 4:30AM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues.
* WHERE...Portions of central and northwest Virginia, including the following counties, in central Virginia, Albemarle, Greene and Orange. In northwest Virginia, Madison.
* WHEN...Until 430 AM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 105 AM EDT, emergency management reported ongoing flooding in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orange... Westmoreland... Hollymead... Gordonsville... Ruckersville... Barboursville... Eheart... Somerset... Old Somerset... Newtown... Dawsonville... Montpelier Station... Montford... Stony Point... Quinque... Madison Run... Madison Mills... Advance Mills... Carrsbrook... Earlysville... - This includes the following Flood Prone Roads... Preddy Creek Road at Preddy Creek, Route 641 at Burnley Branch, Route 640 near Preddy Creek, Route 600 at Preddy Creek, Route 29 near North Fork of The Rivanna River, Route 643 near South Fork of The Rivanna River, Carpenters Mill Road at Route 607, Advance Mills Road and and Route 617, Route 15 at Montebello Road, Route 20 at Route 33, Route 637 near Poorhouse Run, Jones Mill Road, Route 20 East of Route 15, Route 20 at Route 231 and Route 641 near Blue Run Creek. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING

area.areaDesc: Albemarle, VA; Greene, VA; Madison, VA; Orange, VA
